headline.main: MOSCOW REMARKS ON NAZIS IN FINLAND; Reports an Armored Division Has Landed at Abo -- Only 1,300, Helsinki Asserts SOVIET STIRS UNEASILY MOSCOW REMARKS ON NAZIS IN FINLAND

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, April 30 -- Soviet Russia reported today that Germany had landed 12,000 troops with tanks and big guns in Southwestern Finland, within fifty miles of the Hangoe military base that the U.S.S.R. won in her conqueror's peace with the Finnish Republic.
abstract: Moscow Pravda repts German armored div in Finland; map; Moscow German source repts only normal troop transit to Norway; Finland denies presence of number reptd by Pravda; Min Procope explains rept basis; Swedish press on effect on Finnish and Swedish neutrality
